column5: Best of Luck. Look forward to reading some of your sweet trout reports when you get back on your feet.
You guyz/galz are funny & crack me up LoL   Wishing  you all the best Mike & a speedy recovery
Speedy recovery! Not only did Lance Armstrong have it done but also Phil Kessel
Many thanks guys   In the situation that will shortly be presenting itself, I'd like to think about the package being half full...Not half empty  Cheers  Mike
Mike  Maybe you could sing a song about owning a truck with no heater and going to the rodeo.
ya mean like this http://www.youtube.c...h?v=X4NKYn4A3mg  am i bad. Keep your chin up mike.  NOT FOR YOUNG EARS
Todays the big day Mike. Walk in like you own the place
wishing you a speedy recovery to your rod and sinker combo!
Speedy recovery Mike. You will be fine.

Surgery was delayed by 4hrs but it went well from what I was told by the people doing it.  No swelling with only some pain where the incision was made for now - They opted to use staples to zip me up.  Pain isn't enough to really warrant use of pain killers...I actually put myself through a lot more while doing the Navy Seal fitness program for the months prior  Frozen Fire, his girlfriend and Victor stopped by last night and dropped off a couple fishing/photography books and DVDs  Thanks a lot guys.  Really appreciate the support you've given me over the last couple weeks
Glad to hear it went well and that they didn't slice anything in the wrong spot buddy!
Good to hear it went well and you're in good Spirits Mike. One day at at time... the moto in the household here and it will work for you to.
glad to hear Mike just remember use lots of ice and don't strain the muscles in the area. It will be really painful if you do.   Art

WHAT!!!!  they didn't use a uninut.... oopppssss    I mean uniknot for zipping you up  Glad to hear that it went well and that you're on the mend Mike Take it easy and like others said.... one day at a time Jacques
Glad to hear it all went well Mike. Now for a speedy recovery.   GBU    dsn
I haven't been reading the board much lately and just found Mike's original post about his  problems and now I just saw this one too.  All the best Mike and everyone of us is pulling for you.
haha  Good Luck buddy - from Myself, Ginny, Averie and Luke!
You'll be fine Mike. You've got a good team cheering for you.
Best of luck MJL!!!

Oops I just found out because of this thread "Thanks" to Rick." I haven't been on here that much. Sorry to hear.  Hey " Mike" if you need support tell me where you're surgery will be taking place... and I'll be there for you.  I'll pray for you tonight through out.. until your surgery is over that all may go well...    dsn
Good luck MJL and I hope all goes smoothly.
Hey Mike after the surgery you'll have to deal with "itchy sack syndrome" as the incision heals and the hair returns. Just trying to get your mind off of the surgery.  Good luck buddy.
Speedy recovery Mike, thoughts and prayers are with you!!
Hope your "up" and running soon! Speedy recovery!
Hope all goes well MJL.  Remember, a now famous cyclist had it years ago. His name is Lance Armstrong. And he has won 7 Tour de France cycling races since.
My thoughts are with you Mike and I hope for a speedy recovery.

Thanks guys...Can’t say it enough and won’t stop appreciating it all. Rick has been as close to a big brother I could ever ask for during this time, and has been guiding me through the processes (some of which will suck but that's the nature of it).  I consider OFC and all of its members part of my lifestyle, my religion and my family    I promise I won't lick my stitches...  Or my genitals   That would depend on the nurse   Definitely!  One other athlete I do admire a lot is Lance Mackey (an esophageal cancer survivor and 4 time winner of the Iditarod...Along with a few Yukon Quest victories).  I may never race 16 sled dogs across Alaska in 9 days, but his upbeat, positive and humble attitudes are what I admire the most and will probably get me through the times that really suck  Cheers & all smiles
If you get bored Mike...just remember to call over to the cutest nurse as you point to your incision.. "Does this look swollen to you?"
We are all here for ya MJ!  Dont forget the pm I sent ya! Laughter is the best medicine!But say it to the nurses on a serious tone! Seriously!

Hey Mike...Here's to a speedy recovery...  If you were a well bred thoroughbred racehourse and they only removed one they would refer to you as a riggling (Rig)...keeps your mind off the fillies and makes you run faster...
Good luck Mike, you'll be back on the tribs b4 ya know it
Go GET'UM MIKE! We still gotta get on the ice this winter
Hope all went well, fast recovery bud  Joey
Good luck, Mike!!  Praying for you
speedy recovery chum.
Brush it off with ease my friend.

I will definitely be thinking of you and wishing you the best.  My son had one removed when he was 5 months old....Sertoli Cell Tumour.  He is 16 today, walks great and has a deep voice. You will be okay and back to fishing in no time.
best of luck on Thursday MJL...
All the best Mike!  I have a friend who had the same deal as you an Rick.  He is 100% today.  Two nuts in one place is never a good thing anyways.
All the best bud!  I LOL'd pretty hard at the comment about marking down which nut to take out.
So Mike is going to be joining the club on Thursday... I hope all goes well and I know you will be slamming steel in no time!! Even if you are walking funny
All the best Mike, I'm rooting for you.
All the best man!  I'm sure everything will go great for you.
Heres to a speedy recover Mike.
Good luck Mike!!!
I'm sure you will be fine, good luck.
Moosy had similar (the same, only different) surgery just yesterday.  Here she is in recovery mode:     I hope you don't need the collar...
mine and my familys prayers go out to you . Hope all goes well and you will be up and about battleing all those big fishes soon . Good luck too a great guy .  B
Good luck Mike make sure you use a magic marker to circle the right one.....   Art
good luck
Good luck Mike!
All the best Mike.
Good luck man hope your back on the river in no time.
All the best and a speedy recovery.
Good luck to your surgery Mike. I'm sure you'll be on the tribs in no time hookin up !!!  Chris
Good luck and get well soon!
Maybe you'll get a cute surgeon Mike !!!!  Good luck !
Good luck, Mike!!  I thought of you, and your situation today, while fishing...kick it like you would a chrome 12 lber!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
I'm not sure if that's good Wayne ... might have to calm him down before they can do anything LOL.  You know we are all rooting for ya Mike.
Best of Luck!  TDunn
Good Luck Mike,  I hope that all goes well, I am sure that you will be back on your feet in no time!  Daryl
Best wishes Mike. You'll be back on your feet again in no time, I'm sure!
Good luck buddy, I guess we get two in case one goes bad?
good luck mike
